title: New: Beat Culture – Drifter (Feat. Psychic Twin)
content:
Photo: Landon Speers

It feels like an age since Beat Culture released his debut album, Tokyo Dreamer; two years sure do fly by. Aside from a collaboration with Slow Magic at the turn of 2012 and a handful of shows, Sunik Kim has remained relatively quiet, working on new material, with new track Drifter showing off the fruits of his labour. Featuring Brooklyn’s Erin Fein aka Psychic Twin on vocals, it sticks to the intimacy that made his earliest work so listenable, whilst throwing in hints of breaking out into an over-the-top pop number. Check out Drifter below.
